Please make fork of this, as this can be removed by Github.com sooner or later.
CATF44LT7C---

NOTE: If this method is working for you then just press "START".

==============================================================================================================================

For Subsciption until March 10, 2020

Use below method

For Windows Users: go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc Add these lines

0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com 1.2.3.4 account.jetbrains.com 1.2.3.4 http://www.jetbrains.com 1.2.3.4 www-weighted.jetbrains.com

For Linux/Mac users: Open /etc/hosts file. (go to terminal and type: sudo nano /etc/hosts) Add these lines

1.2.3.4 account.jetbrains.com 1.2.3.4 http://www.jetbrains.com 1.2.3.4 www-weighted.jetbrains.com

0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com

Key

56ZS5PQ1RF---
